pages.title: Blessed Blade
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 100 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Very_Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Increases attack damage and deals additional damage

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Please use mods like 'Just Enough Items(JEI)' to see the recipes as they can vary from pack to pack. $(br)Simply press 'usage' on a beacon
